Domesticated Mammals.description: Properties for pets and farm animals

properties.name: size
properties.scale: 1 = very small (hamster, guinea pig), 5 = medium (cat, small dog), 10 = very large (cow, horse)

properties.name: commonness_as_pet
properties.description: How commonly kept as a household pet
properties.scale: 1 = rarely/never a pet (cow, mule), 5 = sometimes a pet (rabbit, goat), 10 = very common pet (dog, cat)

properties.name: energy_level
properties.scale: 1 = very low energy/lazy, 5 = moderate, 10 = extremely high energy

properties.name: grooming_needs
properties.description: Amount of grooming or coat maintenance required
properties.scale: 1 = minimal grooming needed, 5 = moderate, 10 = extensive grooming required

properties.name: intelligence_trainability
properties.scale: 1 = difficult to train/low intelligence, 5 = moderate, 10 = highly intelligent and easily trained

properties.name: vocalization_level
properties.description: How much noise the animal makes
properties.scale: 1 = very quiet, 5 = moderate noise, 10 = very loud/frequent vocalizations

properties.name: lifespan
properties.scale: 1 = very short (few years), 5 = moderate (10-15 years), 10 = very long (20+ years)

properties.name: indoor_suitability
properties.scale: 1 = must be outdoors (cow, horse), 5 = can be either, 10 = ideal for indoor (hamster, cat)

properties.name: playfulness
properties.scale: 1 = not playful, 5 = moderately playful, 10 = extremely playful

properties.name: care_difficulty
properties.description: Overall difficulty of care and maintenance
properties.scale: 1 = very easy to care for, 5 = moderate difficulty, 10 = very difficult/demanding

properties.name: size
properties.scale: 1 = very small (mouse, bat), 5 = medium (fox, raccoon), 10 = very large (elephant, whale)

properties.name: dangerousness
properties.scale: 1 = harmless, 5 = can be dangerous if provoked, 10 = extremely dangerous predator

properties.name: speed
properties.scale: 1 = very slow, 5 = moderate speed, 10 = extremely fast

properties.name: habitat_specificity
properties.description: How specific or adaptable habitat needs are
properties.scale: 1 = very specific habitat (polar bear, panda), 5 = somewhat adaptable, 10 = highly adaptable (raccoon, fox)

properties.name: sighting_commonness
properties.scale: 1 = very rare to see, 5 = occasionally seen, 10 = commonly seen

properties.name: social_behavior
properties.description: Tendency to live in groups vs alone
properties.scale: 1 = strictly solitary, 5 = sometimes social, 10 = highly social/pack animals

properties.name: diet_type
properties.scale: 1 = strict herbivore, 5 = omnivore, 10 = strict carnivore

properties.name: climbing_ability
properties.description: Ability to climb trees or vertical surfaces
properties.scale: 1 = cannot climb at all, 5 = moderate climbing, 10 = excellent climber

properties.name: aquatic_affinity
properties.scale: 1 = avoids water, 5 = comfortable in water, 10 = primarily aquatic (whale, dolphin)

properties.name: nocturnal_tendency
properties.description: Tendency to be active at night
properties.scale: 1 = strictly diurnal, 5 = crepuscular/flexible, 10 = strictly nocturnal

properties.name: size
properties.scale: 1 = very small (gecko), 5 = medium (iguana), 10 = very large (crocodile)

properties.name: dangerousness
properties.scale: 1 = harmless, 5 = can be dangerous, 10 = extremely dangerous

properties.name: aquatic_dependency
properties.scale: 1 = desert dwelling, 5 = semi-aquatic, 10 = fully aquatic

properties.name: temperature_tolerance
properties.scale: 1 = very narrow range, 5 = moderate adaptability, 10 = wide temperature tolerance

properties.name: speed
properties.scale: 1 = very slow, 5 = moderate, 10 = very fast

properties.name: pet_popularity
properties.description: How commonly kept as a pet
properties.scale: 1 = never kept as pet, 5 = sometimes kept, 10 = very popular pet

properties.name: venom_toxicity
properties.scale: 1 = no venom/toxicity, 5 = mildly venomous, 10 = highly venomous/toxic

properties.name: camouflage_ability
properties.description: Ability to blend with environment or change color
properties.scale: 1 = no camouflage ability, 5 = moderate, 10 = exceptional (chameleon)

properties.name: lifespan
properties.scale: 1 = very short (few years), 5 = moderate (10-20 years), 10 = very long (50+ years)

properties.name: activity_level
properties.scale: 1 = very sedentary, 5 = moderately active, 10 = highly active

Birds, Fish, Insects & Other Animals.description: Properties for birds, fish, insects, and other non-mammal, non-reptile animals

properties.name: size
properties.scale: 1 = very small (ant, bee), 5 = medium (chicken, crow), 10 = very large (eagle, shark)

properties.name: flight_capability
properties.description: Ability to fly (mainly for birds and insects)
properties.scale: 1 = cannot fly (penguin, chicken), 5 = limited flight, 10 = excellent flyer

properties.name: aquatic_ability
properties.scale: 1 = cannot swim/terrestrial, 5 = semi-aquatic, 10 = fully aquatic (fish)

properties.name: speed
properties.scale: 1 = very slow, 5 = moderate speed, 10 = extremely fast

properties.name: dangerousness
properties.scale: 1 = harmless, 5 = can be dangerous, 10 = highly dangerous

properties.name: commonness
properties.scale: 1 = very rare, 5 = occasionally seen, 10 = very common

properties.name: intelligence
properties.scale: 1 = basic instinct only, 5 = moderate intelligence, 10 = highly intelligent

properties.name: social_behavior
properties.scale: 1 = strictly solitary, 5 = sometimes social, 10 = highly social/swarms/flocks

properties.name: human_interaction
properties.description: Level of domestication or comfort with humans
properties.scale: 1 = wild/avoids humans, 5 = tolerates humans, 10 = domesticated (chicken)

properties.name: food_value
properties.scale: 1 = not eaten by humans, 5 = occasionally eaten, 10 = major food source

properties.name: height
properties.scale: 1 = very short (10-20 ft), 5 = medium (40-60 ft), 10 = very tall (100+ ft)

properties.name: canopy_width
properties.scale: 1 = narrow/columnar, 5 = moderate spread, 10 = very wide spreading

properties.name: growth_rate
properties.scale: 1 = very slow growing, 5 = moderate, 10 = very fast growing

properties.name: longevity
properties.scale: 1 = short-lived (20-30 years), 5 = moderate (50-100 years), 10 = very long-lived (hundreds of years)

properties.name: shade_density
properties.description: Density of foliage and shade provided
properties.scale: 1 = sparse/light shade, 5 = moderate shade, 10 = very dense/deep shade

properties.name: fruit_production
properties.description: Production of edible fruit or nuts
properties.scale: 1 = no edible fruit, 5 = produces some fruit, 10 = major fruit/nut producer

properties.name: ornamental_value
properties.scale: 1 = low ornamental value, 5 = moderately attractive, 10 = highly ornamental

properties.name: climate_hardiness
properties.scale: 1 = very specific climate needs, 5 = moderately adaptable, 10 = grows in many climates

properties.name: maintenance_needs
properties.description: Amount of care and maintenance required
properties.scale: 1 = very low maintenance, 5 = moderate care, 10 = high maintenance

properties.name: wood_value
properties.scale: 1 = low wood value, 5 = moderate value, 10 = highly valuable timber

properties.name: height
properties.scale: 1 = ground cover (inches), 5 = medium (1-3 feet), 10 = tall (6+ feet)

properties.name: maintenance_needs
properties.scale: 1 = very low maintenance, 5 = moderate, 10 = high maintenance

properties.name: sun_requirements
properties.scale: 1 = full shade, 5 = partial sun, 10 = full sun required

properties.name: water_needs
properties.scale: 1 = drought tolerant, 5 = moderate water, 10 = very high water needs

properties.name: growing_season
properties.scale: 1 = very short season, 5 = moderate season, 10 = year-round/long season

properties.name: ornamental_value
properties.scale: 1 = low ornamental value, 5 = moderately attractive, 10 = highly ornamental

properties.name: edibility
properties.scale: 1 = not edible, 5 = partially edible, 10 = highly edible/culinary herb

properties.name: invasiveness
properties.scale: 1 = non-invasive, 5 = moderately spreading, 10 = highly invasive

properties.name: fragrance
properties.scale: 1 = no fragrance, 5 = mild pleasant scent, 10 = strong fragrance

properties.name: hardiness
properties.scale: 1 = very delicate, 5 = moderately hardy, 10 = extremely hardy

properties.name: size
properties.scale: 1 = very small (berry), 5 = medium (apple), 10 = very large (watermelon)

properties.name: sweetness
properties.scale: 1 = not sweet/tart, 5 = moderately sweet, 10 = very sweet

properties.name: commonness
properties.scale: 1 = very rare/exotic, 5 = moderately common, 10 = extremely common

properties.name: price_level
properties.scale: 1 = very inexpensive, 5 = moderate price, 10 = expensive/luxury fruit

properties.name: juice_content
properties.scale: 1 = very dry, 5 = moderately juicy, 10 = very juicy

properties.name: perishability
properties.scale: 1 = long shelf life, 5 = moderate spoilage rate, 10 = spoils very quickly

properties.name: seed_prominence
properties.scale: 1 = seedless or tiny seeds, 5 = moderate seeds, 10 = many large seeds

properties.name: preparation_needs
properties.description: Amount of preparation required to eat
properties.scale: 1 = ready to eat (banana), 5 = some prep (orange), 10 = extensive prep (coconut)

properties.name: nutritional_density
properties.scale: 1 = low nutrients, 5 = moderate nutrients, 10 = very nutrient-dense

properties.name: texture_firmness
properties.scale: 1 = very soft/mushy, 5 = moderate firmness, 10 = very firm/crisp

Other Raw Foods.description: Properties for raw foods that aren't fruits

properties.name: protein_content
properties.scale: 1 = no protein, 5 = moderate protein, 10 = very high protein

properties.name: preparation_required
properties.scale: 1 = minimal prep, 5 = moderate prep, 10 = extensive preparation

properties.name: perishability
properties.scale: 1 = long shelf life, 5 = moderate, 10 = spoils very quickly

properties.name: price_level
properties.scale: 1 = very inexpensive, 5 = moderate cost, 10 = expensive/premium

properties.name: cooking_versatility
properties.description: Number of ways it can be prepared
properties.scale: 1 = limited uses, 5 = moderate versatility, 10 = extremely versatile

properties.name: flavor_intensity
properties.scale: 1 = very mild, 5 = moderate flavor, 10 = very strong/intense

properties.name: texture
properties.scale: 1 = very soft, 5 = moderate, 10 = very hard/crunchy

properties.name: nutritional_density
properties.scale: 1 = low nutrients, 5 = moderate, 10 = very nutrient-dense

properties.name: dietary_commonness
properties.description: How commonly eaten in typical diets
properties.scale: 1 = rarely eaten, 5 = occasionally eaten, 10 = dietary staple

properties.name: storage_difficulty
properties.scale: 1 = easy to store anywhere, 5 = needs specific conditions, 10 = very difficult to store

Prepared Foods & Meals.description: Properties for prepared dishes and meals

properties.name: preparation_complexity
properties.scale: 1 = very simple, 5 = moderate skill needed, 10 = requires expert skills

properties.name: meal_formality
properties.scale: 1 = casual fast food, 5 = casual dining, 10 = fine dining/formal

properties.name: spiciness

properties.name: richness

properties.name: serving_temperature
properties.scale: 1 = cold/frozen, 5 = room temperature, 10 = very hot

properties.name: popularity
properties.scale: 1 = very uncommon, 5 = moderately popular, 10 = extremely popular

properties.name: price_level

properties.name: healthiness

properties.name: cultural_specificity

properties.name: speed
properties.scale: 1 = very slow, 5 = moderate speed, 10 = supersonic/very fast

properties.name: range

properties.name: cost

properties.name: noise_level

properties.name: fuel_efficiency

properties.name: commonness

properties.scale: 1 = very small engine (under 250cc), 5 = medium (500-750cc), 10 = very large (1000cc+)

properties.scale: 1 = low speed, 5 = moderate speed, 10 = very high speed

properties.name: comfort_level

properties.scale: 1 = budget/entry level, 5 = mid-range, 10 = premium/expensive

Cars, Trucks, Boats & Other Motorized Ve.description: Properties for cars, trucks, boats, and other motorized ground/water vehicles

properties.name: size
properties.scale: 1 = very small (compact car), 5 = medium (sedan/SUV), 10 = very large (semi truck)

properties.name: speed_capability
properties.scale: 1 = slow, 5 = moderate speed, 10 = very fast/sport vehicle

properties.name: passenger_capacity
properties.description: Number of people it can carry
properties.scale: 1 = 1-2 people, 5 = 4-6 people, 10 = many passengers (bus)

properties.name: cargo_capacity
properties.description: Amount of cargo/goods it can carry
properties.scale: 1 = minimal cargo, 5 = moderate cargo, 10 = massive cargo capacity

properties.name: fuel_efficiency
properties.scale: 1 = very inefficient, 5 = moderate, 10 = very efficient

properties.name: luxury_level
properties.scale: 1 = basic/utilitarian, 5 = moderate comfort, 10 = luxury vehicle

properties.name: off_road_capability
properties.scale: 1 = paved roads only, 5 = some off-road, 10 = excellent off-road

properties.name: price
properties.scale: 1 = budget/economy, 5 = mid-range, 10 = expensive/luxury

properties.name: commonness
properties.scale: 1 = very rare, 5 = occasionally seen, 10 = very common

properties.name: specialization
properties.scale: 1 = general purpose, 5 = somewhat specialized, 10 = highly specialized (ambulance, dump truck)

Non-Motorized Transportation.description: Properties for non-motorized vehicles and transportation methods

properties.name: physical_effort
properties.description: Amount of physical effort required to use
properties.scale: 1 = minimal effort, 5 = moderate effort, 10 = high physical exertion

properties.name: speed
properties.scale: 1 = very slow, 5 = moderate speed, 10 = can go fast

properties.name: capacity
properties.description: Number of people or amount of cargo
properties.scale: 1 = single person/minimal cargo, 5 = 2-3 people, 10 = many people/large cargo

properties.name: terrain_versatility
properties.description: Variety of terrain it can handle
properties.scale: 1 = very specific terrain only, 5 = moderate versatility, 10 = works on many surfaces

properties.name: portability
properties.scale: 1 = not portable at all, 5 = somewhat portable, 10 = very portable/foldable

properties.name: skill_required
properties.scale: 1 = easy to use, 5 = moderate skill, 10 = difficult/requires training

properties.name: cost
properties.scale: 1 = very inexpensive, 5 = moderate cost, 10 = expensive

properties.name: maintenance_needs
properties.scale: 1 = very low maintenance, 5 = moderate, 10 = high maintenance

properties.name: weather_dependency
properties.scale: 1 = works in any weather, 5 = somewhat weather dependent, 10 = very weather dependent

properties.name: recreational_vs_practical
properties.description: Primary use for recreation vs practical transport
properties.scale: 1 = purely practical transport, 5 = both uses, 10 = purely recreational

Geological Features & Minerals.description: Properties for geological features and minerals

properties.name: size_scale
properties.scale: 1 = microscopic/tiny mineral, 5 = small rock/crystal, 10 = massive geographic feature (mountain)

properties.name: hardness
properties.scale: 1 = very soft, 5 = moderate hardness, 10 = extremely hard (diamond)

properties.name: rarity
properties.scale: 1 = very common, 5 = moderately rare, 10 = extremely rare

properties.name: value
properties.scale: 1 = low value, 5 = moderate value, 10 = very valuable (precious gems)

properties.name: color_variety
properties.description: Range of colors it can appear in
properties.scale: 1 = single color only, 5 = few colors, 10 = many color varieties

properties.name: accessibility
properties.scale: 1 = very remote/inaccessible, 5 = moderately accessible, 10 = easily accessible

properties.name: formation_time

properties.name: commercial_use
properties.scale: 1 = no commercial use, 5 = some uses, 10 = major commercial/industrial use

properties.name: visual_appeal
properties.scale: 1 = plain/unremarkable, 5 = somewhat attractive, 10 = strikingly beautiful

properties.name: tourist_interest
properties.scale: 1 = no tourist interest, 5 = moderate interest, 10 = major tourist attraction

properties.name: permanence

properties.name: biodiversity

properties.scale: 1 = not a tourist spot, 5 = moderate tourism, 10 = major tourist destination

Abstract Concepts, Places, People & Acti.description: Properties for abstract concepts, places, people, and activities

properties.name: tangibility
properties.scale: 1 = purely abstract concept, 5 = somewhat tangible, 10 = physical place/person

properties.name: commonness
properties.scale: 1 = very rare/obscure, 5 = moderately known, 10 = universally known

properties.name: positive_negative
properties.scale: 1 = very negative, 5 = neutral, 10 = very positive

properties.name: complexity
properties.description: How complex or simple the concept/activity
properties.scale: 1 = very simple, 5 = moderate complexity, 10 = very complex

properties.name: active_passive
properties.scale: 1 = purely passive, 5 = some activity, 10 = highly active participation

properties.name: social_aspect
properties.scale: 1 = purely solitary, 5 = can be either, 10 = highly social

properties.name: time_commitment
properties.scale: 1 = minimal time, 5 = moderate time, 10 = major time commitment

properties.name: skill_knowledge
properties.scale: 1 = no special skill needed, 5 = moderate skill, 10 = high expertise required

properties.name: cost_resources
properties.scale: 1 = free/minimal cost, 5 = moderate cost, 10 = expensive/resource intensive

properties.name: cultural_specificity
properties.scale: 1 = universal, 5 = somewhat cultural, 10 = very culturally specific

properties.name: Is Living
properties.description: How alive or biological the noun is (1=inanimate object, 10=living organism).
properties.scale: 1 (inanimate) to 10 (living being)

properties.name: Is Human-Related
properties.description: How closely connected the noun is to humans, human activity, or society (1=not related, 10=directly human).
properties.scale: 1 (not human-related) to 10 (human-centered)

properties.name: Is Technological
properties.description: Degree to which the noun represents technology, machinery, or electronic systems (1=natural, 10=advanced tech).
properties.scale: 1 (natural) to 10 (high-tech)

properties.name: Is Edible/Food
properties.description: Whether the noun is something eaten or used as food (1=not food, 10=commonly eaten food).
properties.scale: 1 (not edible) to 10 (food)

properties.name: Is Moveable/Portable
properties.description: How easily the noun can be physically moved or carried (1=fixed/immovable, 10=handheld or portable).
properties.scale: 1 (immovable) to 10 (portable)

properties.name: Is Popular/Cultural
properties.description: How recognizable or culturally significant the noun is to the general public (1=obscure, 10=extremely famous).
properties.scale: 1 (obscure) to 10 (widely known)

properties.name: Is Natural
properties.description: Degree of being naturally occurring versus man-made or artificial (1=man-made, 10=natural).
properties.scale: 1 (artificial) to 10 (natural)

properties.name: Is Used for Work/Utility
properties.description: How often the noun is used for practical, work-related, or functional purposes (1=for fun or decoration, 10=for work).
properties.scale: 1 (leisure) to 10 (work tool/profession)

properties.name: Is Associated with Motion/Action
properties.description: How much the noun involves or implies physical movement or activity (1=stationary, 10=highly active/action-based).
properties.scale: 1 (stationary) to 10 (highly dynamic)

properties.name: Is Physical/Tangible
properties.description: How much the noun represents a concrete, touchable object versus an abstract concept or role (1=abstract idea, 10=physical object).
properties.scale: 1 (abstract) to 10 (tangible)
